entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
